file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 35-30-03-02 - PROTECTIVE BREATHING EQUIPMENT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PROTECTIVE BREATHING EQUIPMENT - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the maintenance practices for the PBE (Protective Breathing Equipment). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PROTECTIVE BREATHING EQUIPMENT ALL 35-30-03-960-801-A ♦ (PBE) - DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 35-30-03 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 35-30-03-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PROTECTIVE BREATHING EQUIPMENT (PBE) - DISCARD A. General (1) This task gives the maintenance practices for the PBE. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit and passenger cabin H. Discard Protective Breathing Equipment (PBE) (Figure 201) SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Remove the PBE. (2) See the manufacture date on the identification plate. (3) Discard the PBE, if applicable. (4) Install a serviceable PBE. I. Check/Inspect Protective Breathing Equipment (PBE) SUBTASK 210-002-A (1) Examine the surfaces of the PBE for nicks, cracks, dents, chafed areas, deformation, and the lifetime. (2) (For PBE with "Good Indicator"): See the "good indicator" and make sure that it is green. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 35-30-03 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL PBE - Discard Figure 201 A ZONE 261 A ZONE 231 A ZONE 262 3 "GOOD CONDITION" INDICATOR A ZONE 232 PBE 1 DET. A PBE 2 DET. A 1 FOR PBE WITH "GOOD INDICATOR" 2 FOR PBE WITHOUT "GOOD INDICATOR" 3 ONLY REFER TO THE PBE LOCATION APPLICABLE TO YOUR CONFIGURATION.
